case_title: Filter Pakistan (Pvt.) Limited, Karachi vs Commissioner Inland Revenue, Zone-I, MTO, Karachi
case_number: MA (Stay-Ext) No. 969/KB of 2022 in I.T.A. No. 345/KB of 2021
respondent: Commissioner Inland Revenue, Zone-I, MTO, Karachi

appellant.contention: Tribunal is empowered to grant stay for more than 180 days.
appellant.claim: Irreparable loss if stay is not granted.

legal_analysis: Judgment of Islamabad High Court (2016 PTD 1702) considered.
Judgment of Lahore High Court in Omega Industries case referenced.
tribunal_findings.decision: Stay granted till disposal of main appeal.

additional_notes.temporary_relief: Granted to appellant due to undue hardship.
